Side Effects: No energy
Comments: Dont know if it is working

Side Effects: Nausea
Comments: First antidepressant inmy life that actually WORKS!! I WANT TO GET UP_ DO THINGS.No jitters. Work through the nausea- eat a few peanut butter crackers or saltines_ then take pill_then sit UP. Will only last for a little while. Set aside time to be still. If you lay down right away you will vomit. If you take at bedtime_ once the nausea calms down_lady on or tilt toward your left side especially if you have GERD issues. At 5mg you may see minimal effects. Once you start to increase toward 10mg you should start feeling better. Please get Zofran for the nausea from your doctor if you need it. It keeps you from vomiting.I almost quit in the beginning due to it but I found that the crackers and only a few shops of water worked. Always check all medication interactions with amedication interaction checker online_especially if you use multiple pharmacies. Hang in there. This medication is a miracle for me. Taper up slowly per month if you need to.

Side Effects: Itching_ drowsiness_ rapid weight gain_ clouded mind_ memory loss
Comments: I will say it worked fantastic at first. I was feeling much_ much better but after about a year (I've been taking it for a year and a half) I started noticing a lot of side effects. I just want to sleep all day and night and never feel well rested. I have no energy or motivation and I've gained almost 30 lbs in 3 months. I went from 128 to 155lbs.

Side Effects: I have felt great on this medication.  My weight has remained constant and my bowel movements are regular.  Some nights_ I still have problems sleeping_ and nap during the day  I think I will try to take the medication at night.  I have had some serious loss of equilibrium (not vertigo)_ and I have fallen down 4 times.To date_ these episodes have not been associated with the brintellix by my psychiatrist or specialists I have seen for the problem.  I have even had an MRI and MRA_ and now how an appointment with a neurologist.  I am starting to think that the brinitellix may be associated with the loss of equilibrium.  I intent to discuss with my psychiatrist again.  But I would hate to stop taking this drug_ as it has really helped by depression.  I have more desire to engage in life_ and I am much more social.
Constant nausea despite taking dose at different times. I found taking the dose at night worsened the nausea. Also experienced some abdominal cramps and intermittent itchiness of arms and legs.
Comments: Possibly those people who tend to experience GIT problems should avoid Brintellix / Trintellix.

Side Effects: Anxiety is gone but I have a flat affect_ no sex drive_ very moody and irritable. Makes me tired no matter when I take it.
Comments: I liked it for the first few months. Love how it works on the anxiety. That went away. It is the other side effects like being very tired all the time_ irritability_ moodiness_ no sex drive_ stomach aches and just flat affect that I dont like.

Side Effects: Extreme Mania!!
Comments: After 10 years of trying 7 different Ssri's my PCP put me on Trintellix. The first week I felt ok. Then it as if overnight I went into extreme mania. I had no control over thoughts or actions.I was not eating_ not sleeping_ and extremely compulsive. I was this was for a month!! Almost ended my marriage! Thankfully_ my husband knew me well enough to know something was not right and took me to Dr right away. So now I am back on Zoloft_ for now. I hope no one else has this reaction. It is absolutely horrible!

Side Effects: Nausea_ diarrhea _bad head spinning_ suicidal thoughts _ feeling of "disperation" and "being lost" accompanied by crying. Weird dreams.
Comments: Made me aggressive and angry with the world.

Side Effects: Weight gain!!
Comments: Gaining weight made me more depressed

Side Effects: Dizziness the first few days started at ten mg.  Seemed to work for about ten days then it didn't so I upped to 15 mg made me extremely tired so started taking it at night.  Took it at 20 mg for one week with constipation being unbearable so quit cold turkey like they advertise you can do.  Took nothing for 2 days than started back on my go to Wellbutrin sr ten days on it now and the transition was worse then tapering Effexor.
Nausea and upset stomach especially when I take it without food.
Comments: It has helped me with my anxiety. I was on lexapro for almost 2 years and I got really fat...from 49 KGS to 69 kgs in less than 2 years. My doctor switched my meds and my weight has plateaud though I am still not losing weight. Aside from the side effects_ Brintellix has worked well for me so far.

Side Effects: Nothing
Comments: Helped to over come my fatigue

Side Effects: Rapid weight gain
Comments: More depressed now due to the weight gain

Side Effects: Muscle aches_ headaches_ runny nose_ feeling flat_ decreased motivation_ nightmares_ itching_ diminished sex drive
Comments: I no longer feel suicidal but the side effects are too much. Tapering off now and feel like I have a mild case of the flu.

Side Effects: I couldnt lose weight_ gained slightly_ and was so incredibly edgy. I felt constant anger_ anxiety and self-hatred. After trying about 6 different meds to treat my anxiety and depression_ i despised this one the most. I fought with family constantly and couldnt control my emotions AT ALL. And felt more depressed because i started gaining weight.
Comments: I would recommend you stay as far away from this medication as possible.

Side Effects: Upset stomach
dizziness and nausea
Comments: Disorder_ generalized anxiety and major depression. After three months failed treatment with escitalopram 20 mg and 3.5 mg lorazepam specialist values ​​change to vortioxetina (brintellix) starting with 10 mg_ the first days mild side effects with dizziness and nausea. After three weeks of treatment with no apparent improvement in my state the specialist assesses the dose up to 15 mg not noticing significant improvement till the ninth week of treatment with brintellix. The most appreciable it has been on my anxiety disorder improvement not so much in what refers to depression although this also appreciate a slight improvement though still modest. Discomfort as anhedonia and tiredness even though I continue to notice some improvement at the cognitive level. Also appreciably increased appetite although without gaining weight. Currently I have managed to lower the dose of 3.5 mg lorazepam 2.5 mg thanks to lower my anxiety levels. waiting next valuation specialist to continue giving an opportunity to brintellix. regards

Side Effects: Intermittent Dizziness. Annoying_but tolerable. Anxiety went from a 9 to a 1.5-2. Very very satisfied.
Comments: Best medication for panic and GAD_ in my opinion. Took effectorXR for 7 yrs and this year anxiety was the worst it's ever been. Brintellix saved my life.

Side Effects: Little dizziness first few months_ but that is also a side effect of anxiety.
Comments: Took about 7 different medicines for anxiety two of them I ended up in hospital over them_ brintellix was my last hope.And it has worked wonders for me.

Side Effects: Horrible nausea_ rapid weight gain.
Comments: It helped_ tremendously_ with the anxiety.

Side Effects: Terrible weight gain
Migraine headaches very bad. Itching and severe nausea then vomiting so no appetite. Want to stay in bed terrible drug
Comments: Waiting for doctor return call to hopefully get off this

Side Effects: I tried this med last year but due to extreme constipation switched. Back on it now because other than constipation it's the best I have ever tried. Since I was on 40mg Prozac 2 weeks ago and could not wean before starting brintellix I am only on 5mg right now. Prozac can take several weeks to leave the body and increase brintellix effects by 2 times. When I try to increase my dosage right now I have symptoms of serotonin syndrome for about 1 hour (heart racing_ sweating_ shaking_ shivering_ anxiety_ nausea)_ so I am waiting another week to increase to maybe 7.5. Cutting the pills is difficult (shape)_ but it can be done. First few days I experienced a metal taste in my mouth_ feeling of warmness_ and a little bit of jitters about 1 hour after taking it. Only lasted 5 to 10 minutes. Now  I have night sweats_ feel little motivation_ and sleepy_ but it has helped with my anxiety a lot. Anxiety feels physical so I don't freak out. Last time I was on 10mg I felt pretty good all around. Feel more logical and in charge of my life_ less emotional and out of control. I'm expecting to feel better as I will slowly increase to 10mg over the next few weeks. Do not recommend transitioning from Prozac because of long half life and increase of brintellix plasma makes transitioning extremely difficult.
Comments: Other side effects right now are sometimes upset stomach_ soft stools_ little moodiness.

Side Effects: No major side effects. Seem more on an even keel. Helps with my anxiety. Had fewer panic attacks.
Paranoia_ agitation_ thought people were plotting to kill me. Extreme anxiety. Feeling of "losing it".
A little nasuea after a couple of days but gone within the first week
Comments: Thinking clearly and feeling great! Anxiety issues are gone as well.

Side Effects: Anxiousness_ I have to take sleeping pills to sleep otherwise id be up all night restless.
Comments: This medicine is GREAT for major extreme depression_ like I can't move or get out of bed depression. It gives you energy_ motivation_ but too much of it can make you feel kind of just Ughh blah ya know. So stick with the dose whatever makes you happy and have energy. Brintellix is the boss over any ssri out there.

Side Effects: Strange neurological symptoms
Comments: I had heard great things about Brintellix so I was excited to try it and was extremely disappointed when I had an adverse reaction. My face went numb_ lips tingly_ I was slurring my words_ and my whole body was twitching. It was some kind of strange migraine/seizure-like neurological thing so I had to stop taking the med. Luckily none of the bad effects lingered after the Brintellix was out of my system.

Side Effects: Visual hallucinations_ nausea_ morning insomnia (wake up at 5 am but refreshed)_ dizziness_ irritability. Side effects are mild and subsides after 1 week. Better tolerance_ than with tricyclics and SSRIs/SSNRIs.
Comments: Brintellix is a serotonin modulator and stimulator that has a different mode of action and also stimulates norepinephrine and acétylcholine release in the brain. I was a methamphetamine drug addict_ and I tried all the antidepressants available including tricyclics. Anafranil was excellent but I had some annoying side effects. Since I take Brintellix_ the brain fog disappeared and I have more energy_ more motivation_ a better quality of life and I don't suffer from social anxiety anymore. My quality of sleep is better. I didn't gain any weight. I have a more concentration and it helps my ADHD. I use in combination with Vyvanse 40 mg_ Lamictal 100 mg and Wellbutrin SR 100 mg BID. People that didn't try for at least 4 to 8 weeks shouldn't put ratings on drugs.

Side Effects: Jaw clenching!
Comments: It has been fantastic for me. I've had no serious side effects such as nausea_ diarrhea etc. I feel more focused and on top of things.

Side Effects: hyper anxiety_ nausea with coffee_ compulsive eating_ unusual dreams_
Comments: i do think it has helped the depression_ but has kicked the anxiety into overdrive.

Side Effects: First couple of days on this medication I was knocked on my butt.  Very fuzzy_ tired and dizzy.  I definitely experience nausea on this medication but nothing I cannot handle by now.  If I do not eat with it_ that's when I experience most of the nausea.  Also_ if I do not eat with it I will experience diarrhea.I have a great doc who put me on the brat diet until the symptoms were tolerable.  Organic apple juice_ toast_ rice_ crackers and light chicken soups.  Other than that_ I have not had anything bothersome other than insomnia which I take benedryl to help relieve.
Comments: I'm very sensitive when it comes to medication.  So instead of switching me_ my doctor helped me work my way through the  side effects.  10 mg pulled me out of a depressed fog.  I suspect I'll end up on 20 mg for full relief.  No high blood pressure_ no weight gain_ no food cravings....it's worth a shot if you can get through the first few weeks.

Side Effects: Decreased sex drive (as with all antidepressants I've taken)
Comments: Brintellix cured me of MDD. I have been on antidepressants for 7 years and this is the only medication that helped me. I was on Celexa_ Zoloft_ and Effexor before I took this and the previous medications all failed. I took Brintellix for 2 years and I'm now in my final days of weaning off the medication.

Side Effects: Nausea at night whilst sleeping and anxiety
Depression / feeling flat / Stomach cramp / diarrhea / loss of motivation / burning skin
Comments: Tried most of the SSRI's but only got limited results. My main problem is anxiety. This drug did nothing for me. It made me feel flat. Did not improve my mood at all in fact it made me emotionless and depressed. **IMPORTANT** - Just because it did not help me does not mean it won't be your "wonder drug". Remember everyone is different and you may find this drug works great for you. Unfortunately it did nothing for me.

Side Effects: I dealt with itchiness and bruising. The former didn't worry my pdoc too much but when I told her about the bruising she insisted I stop taking it. Disappointed because I wanted to give it a chance.
Horrible dizziness and nausea
Comments: Heard such good things_ had hoped this would help me. I've been pn paxil 2 years_ hate it and need to get off it_ but weaning without side effects was hard_ and this drug just made those worse.

Side Effects: Dizziness_ headache_ gas
Comments: I am switching to Brintellix from Paxil as the Paxil has seemed to run its course in helping my depression.  Doctor said she's seen good things with this med and thinks it will be good for me.  The first couple of days were fine.  Yesterday and today I have alot of dizziness and headaches.  When I move my head_ it feels like my brain has to physically catch up.  Have to work hard to absorb information or listen right now.  We stopped the Paxil cold turkey and started with the 10 mg of this hoping that would ease some of the withdrawal symptoms.  Not sure if this weird thing I'm having is withdrawal from the old med or side effect of this new one.  I knew Paxil is hard to withdrawal from_ but I'm going to hang in there with this one and hopefully this feeling gets better.  Super gassy-I know that's the Brintellix.  No itching yet.  Lots of racing thoughts_ but that's my norm anyways.  Slept fine last night_ but took 1/2 an Ambien before bed.

Side Effects: Too many to list
Comments: After being hopeful too hopeful in fact I find this medicine to be the worst I've ever taken !After 15 years trying everything under the sun this is so disappointing. I can't get out of bed _ can't concentrate _ major itching _ major stomach problems _ just more anxious about life _ scared of life .My worst experience ever _ considering going to hospital

Side Effects: No Side effects experienced
Comments: Have experienced major depressive episodes on and off for 20 years. Had limited success on Lexapro but transitioned to brintellix due to unpleasant side effect on the Lexapro. ( weight gain_ sexual dysfunction)Best thing I have ever done_ feel re-engaged with my wife an children. Vastly improved concentration at work. More energy around the house_ and have re-started projects I had lost the motivation to continue with. Still effected by anxiety but with less severe attacks and much shorter in duration_

Side Effects: Horrible itching Dr. added Atarax 3 x daily as needed itching tappered off over the next two weeks itching totally gone by week three
Comments: Was already on 300 Wellbution XL and Xanax 1mg three times daily Dr added 20mg Brintellix Worked wonders for me no other side effects other than the itching.  Results noticed within the first week  Worked well enough that Xanax is now only PRN Really expensive med about $385 for 30 pills without insurance

Side Effects: At first I wasn't have any side effects to my knowledge_ Then a few days later the itching began_ On my legs and chest and back_ it comes and goes and its worse at night! This seems to be the only side effect but it's terrible! I'm going to talk to my doctor about getting off of it.
Slight nausea
Comments: I started with a 5mg taper up dose and moved to 10mg/day after 1 week.  As soon as I started the 10mg dose I was able to feel an improvement in my thought processes.  Prior to Brintellix_ I had been constantly obsessing with anxiety and depressed_ feeling hopeless and that I was just hear to wait until death took me.  A week after the 10 mg/day dose_ I was able to think about my day and things that I needed to do.  No more obsessing.  And_ I am able to make life meaningful with just my day to day activities again.  Before it was work and come home.  Now_ it's work_ come home and find meaningful things to do!

Side Effects: So far I have only experienced little red spots appearing all over my skin. I have had a bit of insomnia but then again I always do. My anxiety is a bit higher but not unbearable. I am concerned about the red spots because this is what happened to me when I took Paxil. It turned into extreme itching after the spots appeared.
Comments: I haven't had any of the nausea that people complain about so far. I have taken it on an empty stomach and with food. The amazing thing about it so far is that it has already stopped my constant thoughts of suicide. I haven't been crying all the time or had mood swings. I am concerned about the people who said that they gained weight with this drug. I know it is supposed to be weight neutral. I am already over-weight from taking in the past Depakote_ Zyprexa_ Remeron and other drugs that make you gain weight. Right now I am only taking Brintellix_ Xanax and Trazadone. I just read that someone said it wasn't good to take Trazadone and Brintellix together.  I am supposed to stay on the dose I'm on for 2 weeks and then bump it up to 10mg. If the spots turn into itching I will have to discontinue this drug I guess. I also read about the short term memory loss. That worries me as I already have that from taking various different Benzos for years. I know what they do to my memory.

Side Effects: Terrible nausea and dull headache. After several weeks of nausea and headaches_ I tried taking the Brintellix with food: no side effects when taken with food. Decreased sex drive.(Never had side effects with any other SSRI)
Comments: I've never had side effects with other antidepressants. This one has also caused decreased sex drive. It was 6 weeks before I had relief from my depression. While not as tearful as before the therapeutic dose_ I feel blah and lacking emotion such as laughter. Not interested in things I used to enjoy.

Side Effects: Nausea extreme sometimes vomiting.
Comments: First relief I had felt in over 20 years. I had suicide thoughts daily. I haven't felt that after this medicine.

Side Effects: Gave me nausea. I took it at night.. It's constantly giving me restless legs_ I'm exhausted and have gained 8 lbs in 2 weeks. I actually feel worse now that I'm on this medicine.

First 2 weeks very horrible nausea.  Helps to take right b4 bed with some crackers.  Side effects muscle tension_ especially neck...some weight gain.  At 2 month mark began to have serious memory lapses which continued so unfortunately I am now tapering off.
Comments: Started at 10 mg...too much nausea and just felt "weird" .. so backed down to 5 mg after 3 weeks.  At 5mg felt great -- able to exercise_ lifting of suicidal thoughts_  energy returned_ able to sleep_ in a good mood.  Unfortunately the memory lapses became intolerable around 2 month mark_i gave it another month but still problematic so now tapering off.  Sad this didn't work out - tbe mood improvement was a relief but the memory effects were a little scary and caused me stress.

Side Effects: nausea_ flatulence_ lethargy
Comments: I have treatment resistant depression. Have tried many meds and always have a horrible reaction and no benefits. I started Brintellix on 5mg_ in case of bad reaction. Took that for 2 weeks_ then upped to 10mg for 2 weeks_ then 15mg for 3 weeks. My depression did not lessen. In fact_ I possibly felt worse. However_ I did stop crying daily_ but was probably just too numbed out. I didn't actually feel any better_ had no energy_ and just sat on the couch all the time. I did have nausea daily but I have a pretty iron stomach so no vomiting. After nearly two months_ I gave up on the med. Within 2 weeks of stopping_ I gained 7 lbs. I had been the same weight for over a year and suddenly was rapidly gaining weight. Aside from lethargy and moderate nausea_ I really had no noticeable side effects. It was hard to tell that I was taking anything at all.

Side Effects: Immediate satisfaction on 5 mg.  increased after one week to 10mg.  I have not been this happy for years.  Nothing upsets me.  My children and I are having fun together.  I no longer obsess on small things and have quit tearing up for absolutely no reason. Flatulance is an issue.  Yep.  Pretty bad.
Comments: I think the world would be a better place if they all felt the way I do on BrinT

Side Effects: I was fine the first day_ I swore I even felt more like myeself the next day_ had some nausea... But it was tolerable. The next evening I took it..... Whoa nelly! It was like I took ipecac syrup! Violent vomiting. Is there anything you can do to slow the absorbtion to minimize this side effect until my body adjusts?

I've been taking 60mg of Cymbalta with success for 9 years. Until the last 3 months I've experienced severe depression which may be due to becoming perimenopausal but regardless my doctor switched me from 60mg Cymbalta to 10mg of Brintellix without tapering. Felt manic_ had great energy but agitation_ anxiety and intense irritability within 2 days. In short_ I felt terrible. Doctor changed me back to cymbalta at 120mg which I've been on for exactly a month now but I'm in severe depression still. Started birth control to see if hormones will help and looking into a Novasure procedure to see if that makes a difference. I've was diagnosed with depression 30 years ago and have taken Effexor_ Zoloft_ Wellbutrin_ Serzone_ abilify_ at multiple long-term periods in my life. Has anyone experienced depression during  perimenopausal time? Suggestions?
Comments: Wouldn't transition from one med to Brintellix without tapering off and overlapping.

Side Effects: Started at 5mg and had mild nausea and sleeplessness but did experience some improvement in depressive symptoms and anxiety. Even noticed improved cognitive functioning and concentration. But that all changed after 2 weeks when massive even worse anxiety and depression ensued. Became completely obsessive about every little thing and brain was racing with random negative thoughts. Would awake every night after 4 hours sleep with mind racing so badly sleep was impossible. Developed a severe pressure headache and fogged out disassociated feeling as well as noticeable problems with memory recall and even slurred speech. Went straight to Dr after finishing 1 month supply of pills and was told to stop immediately and was placed on Prozac which produced immediate improvements.
Comments: Obviously this drug works for some but not for others -- everyone has different body chemistry and genetic make-up -- but for me this drug_ after early promise_ proved to be a 2 week psychotic roller coaster ride that made me far worse mentally. Hope and perseverance are not reliable methods to address severe symptoms. If it's not working for you talk to your doctor fast. There are other options.

Side Effects: First week scratchy eyes and irresistible sleepiness at odd times. In addition: Second week constipation_ almost non-stop belching_ and abdominal bloating.  Throat irritation from belching.
Comments: I am sensitive to meds and at the end of 1st week was elated by how I was feeling even on low dose.  Worried now that side effects in 2nd week may not resolve and I may have to stop Brintellix.

Side Effects: Nausea_tummy problems for a while.I also have M.S.so my biggest issue is VERY bad constipation that all usual remedies fail.Some Insomnia_occassional nightmares.
Comments: I am dosing off 150 mg Wellbutin_but have dropped odd 2 other meds since starting this Med! Tried to do it too soon and had a setback.I have had to do some navigating_ like switching from day to night to offset tummy stuff_in the beginning. Now_I take early morn .If insomnia is bad I can augment with a low dose Xanax.I was determined to hang with this and am thrilled that I have. Feeling peaceful and grateful.

Side Effects: Itchiness
Comments: I was having days I couldn't even get out of bed_ eat_ or do anything for myself that's how bad my depression was. I've been on over 40 different psych drugs in hopes of reducing my depression. This is the ONLY drug I've taken that didn't give me sexual side effects_ or any other bad reaction. Within two week I started noticing a slights change for the better and now after a month in feeling amazing even at the lowest dose. Give it some time and realize the therapeutic dose is ideally 15-20mg a day. So_ if you don't notice much in the beginning its because you're probably not on the right dose for you. I HIGHLY recommend this med. It even helps me focus.

Side Effects: Not sure if this related to med but I never got a real cycle this month. No_ I'm not pregnant. I'm also very snappy and weepy. I have more energy tho. So need to contact to find out do I increase it or just start weaning off of it!
itching_ extreme dizziness_ weird feeling over all_ hyper active_ trouble concentrating
Comments: I was on Zoloft for 10+ years_ it worked very well for me_ but like any SSRI it began to lose it's potency. Dr. suggested this med and I felt it helped a little with anxiety_ but gave me more weird feelings of dizziness_ depression_ feelings of doom etc. Then the hyperactive spells came and I hated that_ still on it right now_ thinking of switching else.

Side Effects: It seems to help with my depression but also seems to be aggravating anxiety and trouble sleeping.  Nausea is terrible but lessening with time.  It is better if taken with food.  Although it seems to make me extremely tired feeling_ when I lay down to sleep_ my mind is racing and I can't sleep.  Only sleep short amounts even with xanax.  I have been on xanax/kloni for years.  Have never had trouble sleeping with the xanax before.   I am going to try changing up the time that I take it and see if that helps.  I am also going to try to continue it and see if the sleep/anxiety thing is maybe another side effect that may reside with time.

My head gets very itchy.  keep scratching my head. sometimes have to take Benadryl for it.  was keeping me awake but switched to morning which is better.  If i eat with food dont get nauseaus.  my memory is fabulous on Brintellix.  so smart. remember things from childhood.  Trying to figure out if there is weight gain just upped it
Comments: I dont feel it helps me depression as much as Prozac did.  I would like to combine them but my dr wont let me. Just upped to 20 to see if that helps with obsessive thoughts.  dont know yet

Side Effects: Fatigue
Comments: So far_ Brintellix has worked for me. I still have to take Xanax for GAD_ but overall I'm feeling a lot better than I've felt in a while. Prozac_ made me feel crazier for reason. Lamitcal worked only for a short period of time_ and ended up in the hospital taking Viibryd. Good luck to everyone.

Side Effects: Some cramping_ neck_ shoulder_ back pain and fatigue. Mood swings and slurred speech. Dr. having me take with 150 mg of Wellbutrin with Brintellex. I have consulted pharmacist and both are in the same class and doesn't recommend being on both. Will be speaking to another Dr about combo.

Brintellix made me gain 15 pounds even though it was not supposed cause weight change. It made me sleepy and drowsy for the first hour after taking it. It helped with anxiety but not mood. I could not increase the dosage because of the side effects.

Reason: and SNRI that I'm struggling to thi
Side Effects: Day 2 was extreme mania day 3 was extreme headaches and brain zaps with extreme dizziness I couldn't move my head without having trouble walking because of the dizziness I'm hoping that goes away therefore I just took the pills so I don't know what'll happen but last night I did sleep I know that was because I was so exhausted from zero sleep the night before so I'm hoping that today is a better day rent alex is working wonders for my daughter she has bipolar disorder and is 25 I have a host of symptoms and problems and I have found nothing that works that's far hoping brintellix might be the answer but the side effects are pretty extreme I have cramping in my leg and I don't know if that has anything to do with it but its all the way from my hip to my foot and at night I just roll around in my and make myself comfortable this began the night I started taking Ben to Alex
Comments: Hoping it works and curious if anyone else is experiencing the brain zaps also called brain shivers or you may think of it as dizziness it is overwhelming and I cannot drive my car

Side Effects: Mild to moderate stomach cramps_ nausea and mood swings.
Comments: I started off on 5mg and was having mild relief from anxiety and depression and was getting out more. Seemed promising so after 2 weeks my doctor bumped me up to the 10 mg. Yikes!! Cramps were almost unbearable. I was in bed for the next 2 weeks. When I was able to get out I was moody and nauseated. Stopped cold on week 4. It's been 4 days and I've been experiencing itching and still the cramps intermittently lasting for days at a time. No other side effects. Very unhappy but gave it a 3 because it was helping me in the beginning.

Side Effects: Weight gain_ sleeplessness_ emotionless_ tired_ worse feeling the longer I take it

Very nauseating and vomiting headache made me feel worse than I was Dr gave me samples for a month but after a week I called her and told her I need something else this medicine made me very nauseated and headaches not taking anymore its bad
Comments: Worst experience with medication I have had

Side Effects: nausea at first but has since disappeared. At times I feel like I dont give a crap about anything and then there are times when I am smiling and I feel like I am getting better. But mostly good thus far.
Comments: Started at 5mg for one week and now have been on the 10 mg for 1 week. I am hoping after a month I will feel better from this. I stopped Celexa for the weight gain and the decreassed libido . I was also on the wellbutrin before and I could not tolerate the vivid dreams and insomnia. Dr. recommended this. My insurance does not cover this medication and I am hoping they will change and approve if it works. Right now I have samples.

Side Effects: Slightly nauseated
Comments: My Dr had me taper off Cymbalta by going from 60 mg to 40 mg for 1 week while also taking 5mg of Brentillex & the next week 20 mg of Cymbalta & upping Brintellix to 10 mg.  it seems to be going okay so far.  I am feeling flushed & a little anxious. Not sure if it has to do with the decrease of Cymbalta.  Saturday will be my first day with no Cymbalta & just the 10mg of Brentillex.  I am praying that this transition goes good & the Brentillex helps.

Side Effects: Horrendous nausea and vomiting_ which began 1 week after starting Brintellix.  Increase of Migraine headaches.  Have lost 12 pounds due to constant nausea and have been in the hospital twice for extreme vomiting and dehydration.
Comments: Brintellix really helped my depression at 20mg per day_ which then was tapered down to 10mg per day.  The CONSTANT NAUSEA and frequent vomiting has become intolerable and am meeting with my Dr. to discuss changing meds.  This was the first drug - IN 20 YEARS - that made a positive improvement in my depression_ so am upset that I cannot use it.

Side Effects: Sometimes nauseated out of the blue_ weight loss-YAY!! I'm on many others meds so I cannot blame any other side effects on this med.
Comments: I LOVE this med! My depression has decreased as has my weight & hunger. I'm feeling much better!

Reason: MDD_ anxiety and sleep diorder/ fib
Side Effects: In the beginning I had nausea and vomiting_ weight gain and difficulty concentrating. The nausea has passed_ but I am in such a fog state that I am unable to function. I feel more depressed and less active than prior to taking this medication.
Comments: I am going to see my psychiatrist tomorrow. I will be suggesting to stop the medication because I feel worse after taking this medication. But my psychiatrist has been less than helpful_ she keeps threatening to drop me as a patient. She says none of her other patients complain about these symptoms. I also have had numbness in one hand since taking this med. She says it is not medication related_ but I'm concerned about permanent nerve damage. This psychiatrist has no compassion and is in the wrong business. I feel like I have no life_ being in constant pain and unable to sleep. Drug also causes nightmares that wake me up.

Side Effects: Switching to Brintellix from Celexa due to untenable and rapid weight gain from SSRI's. Tapering down on Celexa and slowly introducing Brintellix I have noticed extreme irritability like I want to yell at someone and have very little patience. Not sure if this is because of decreasing Celexa or the Brintellix. I really hope it will help with my anxiety and depression. I have out on weight wth almost every anti-depressant out there: Celexa_ lexapro_ Effexor_ pristiq_ ability_ Zoloft_ Prozac made me crazy I had to get off of it. Even put on weight with Wellbutrin. A check swap analysis reports I will not metabolize Brintellix well but new psychiatrist wants to try it. Have lost a lot of hair on Lamictal but did not gain weight.
Comments: Not sure if I can tolerate it and no idea where to go next.

Side Effects: I've taken about every ssri and snri available.  This one is pretty good.  Doesn't do as much for my anxiety as I would like.  I also take a light dose of trileptil and klonopin.   Brintellix made me pretty sick at first and it took me some time to get stabilized. I won't switch_ this is the best I've tried.  .
Loss of appetite_abdominal discomfort_fatigue_increased depression_constipation. Stopped 3 weeks ago_symptoms worse.
Nausea_ Itching_ Diarrhea (all symptoms disappeared within 3-4 weeks)
Comments: I am a young African American woman who has been living with depression and anxiety for 5 years. I've tried many many different medications with no relief. In November 2014 I started taking 10mg of Brintellix and noticed a difference in my depression within weeks. Usually during the fall and winter months I would be severely depressed_ not leaving my house and many times not even leaving the bed for days at a time but since starting Brintellix that has greatly changed. In the summer of 2015 I started having panic attacks 1-2 days a week which I was told was due to my body getting use to the dose I was on. My dosage has since been increased to 20mg and I'm continuing to get relief from my depression.

Side Effects: Horrible_ horrible experience with this drug!  Could not sleep; anxiety increased ten fold and I became irratible_ nervous_ emotional and light headed.  I had to stop taking the medication.

Bloating and excessive gas after eating for the first week. No constipation. GI symptoms went away after about a week and a half. Feeling normal now_ anxiety is under control. Hoping I can lose weight on this medicine as Effexor caused a 25lb weight gain in two months.

Massive weight gain and I exercise more and cannot lose weight. Has helped with anxiety but gaining all this weight has now made me depressed. Don't know what to do I do not want to try another medicine and go through all that.
None
Comments: Has Greatly reduced anxiety and depression

Side Effects: This is an update of my initial review from July 2015. I had only been on the med a week at that point. I first found this to be very promising. Side effects were manageable and I had a very brief period of clarity and motivation which led my doc and I to decide to bump up to 10mg. Well_ I'm not sure how that went because I was asleep 90% of the time. I could not stay awake. Generally_ I have issues with insomnia. This was like 2 or 3 naps per day and sleeping through the night and into the afternoon. No good. Back to 5mg. I haven't noticed any more "up" days but what I've finally realized is the ridiculous amount of sweating that I've been concerned about_ complaining about_ disgusted about_ is more than likely from this med. It has become such an embarrassing problem that my anxiety is increased. I literally am dripping sweat from my hairline and back and the rest of my skin is clammy. It's unbearable now. I thought I'd see if it would subside like some of the other side ef
Comments: I've been on many SSRIs and SNRIs and have never experienced the excessive (REALLY excessive) sweating as with this medication. It has been mortifying and uncomfortable and there is no way that I can continue like this. I wasn't seeing much_ if any_ improvement anyway_ so I'll be glad to get rid of this one.

Side Effects: Nausea for weeks that finally stopped_ muscle aches and pains
Comments: Seemed to make depression worse. Constant fatigue and no motivation_ apathy.

Side Effects: Nausea_ dizziness_ headaches_ anger_ fear_ teeth grinding_ jaw jittering
Comments: Awful. Felt like I was on speed. No improvement of symptoms_ in fact anxiety was increased.

Side Effects: Switched off lexapro due to excessive bruising and my psych dr gave me samples of this and deplin because I have trouble converting folate. First day of brintellix I didn't notice anything_ second day I took it with my birth control and ended up vomiting. Called my md _ said to cut it in half and if it's worse to take Dramamine or pepto. So I went two days without anything and tried again_ first night I was fine and then tonight I threw up again. Not sure if food is making it worse or not but my dr said to take it at night_ which I have been. I can't tell a difference yet with the medicine. I've only been focused on the nausea and vomiting. It's bad.

Nausea the first week. I feel chilled out and happier. I'm enjoying the smaller things in life now. My sadness and agitation has gone. The only thing I HATE is my INCREASED appetite. I have been gaining weight. I'm wondering if my doctor can prescribe me something for appetite or weight loss.. idk
Horrible swollen feet. So bad that I cannot walk. Stopped taking it for four days and feet still extremely swollen. Had a metabolic panel done today.

Mild headaches first week.  Brain zaps due likely to coming off cymbalta (which was no good). Some insomnia but when you feel good you don't really mind.  Not up all night but sometimes an hour or two later than normal.
Comments: So far it has helped a lot with my depression and my anxiety which was horrible with cymbalta.  Prior to cymbalta had been on Lexapro for 10 years until it pooped out.  This will sound odd but am somehow more focused_ almost smarter on Brintelli.  I'm a professional and was reasonably intelligent before_ but find my self talking smoother and saying all the right things at work.

Side Effects: Just concerned that my flu symptoms may be from the Brintellix
Comments: Brintellix has stabilized my mood.  I`m less agitated with my husband and I have less social anxiety however; I am worried that my consistent flulike symptoms are being caused by the Brintellix.  I would appreciate any comments from others if you are experiencing this as well.  Good luck and thanks for reading my comments.

Side Effects: Itching. Everywhere.
Comments: Great coverage of my symptoms_ can't stand the itching.

Side Effects: None!!
Comments: Miracle drug for me. Halfway through the first day of taking it_ I stopped and realized that I hadn't really worried about anything that day. The same feeling continues today! I can think more clearly on this drug as well!

Side Effects: First day or two_ very sleepy after morning dose_ but that has subsided. Headache for almost a week_ somewhere between mild and wake-me-out-of-sleep agony. Also seems to be subsiding. Biggest problem has been major acid reflux and not remembering or wanting to eat_ totally put off most foods. This is another effect that seems to be getting better. Also noticed a lot of very brief "flashbacks" throughout the day today (day 7) during which i get a one to two second flash of what I think is a dream I had but I can't quite grasp anything substantial or recall anything immediately after. It's weird and frustrating_ but not painful or scary.
Comments: Had been at a very low point of a depressive episode and felt relief within two days. Have been on most every SSRI at some point. I take this with Wellbutrin at the moment_ not sure if that will be continued. I feel better than I have in a while and it's only been a week. I have everything crossed that the benefits will continue while the side effects subside.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Finally!!!! I love it!!!!!!

Side Effects: Worsening of depression_ nightmares_ vivid dreams_ flashbacks_ blurred vision_ eye pain.
In the beginning nausea_ constipation (short term)
Comments: I had to restart Brintellix twice due to waiting on insurance to approve it since it's new. The second time I only got the nausea maybe two days. Start at half a pill the first few days to build up. It's the only thing that has worked for me in years. The only thing I'm getting used to is the added energy I have...I'm not used to having any so believe it or not it does taking getting used to. But this is a good thing! I'm on 5 mg and will probably stay there. Took about a week but I'm feeling better than I have in a while.

Side Effects: Loss of energy appetite decrease and always will feel sick to my stomach.
minor nausea at the beginning but taking it with food helped
Comments: Brintellix saved my life. My improvement was dramatic_ and when I weened off it after 10 months to become pregnant I had no difficulty with withdrawal. A friend of mine also agrees this is a miracle drug for major depression.

Side Effects: itching_ headaches every day_ slightly foggybut it does help with depression a bit_ and Ive tried every other med there is_ even seizure drugs and lots of combos
Weight gain. Night eating. Abdominal bloating.

This is the worst experience I have ever had with an antidepressant. I already have insomnia and now my medicine for sleep is useless. I have severe appetite and am extremely violent. I feel like I may need to go to the hospital. I have been on many things and I am switching immediately! This drug is not worth it!
Comments: NO just NO.

Side Effects: Severe untenable itching...everywhere! Also very easily angered and tired. Even Benadryl combined with prescription reactine didn't help itch! Headaches and sore esophagus.
Weight gain. Night eating. Angry. Crying.Anxiety. no discernible help with atypical depression. Considering hospitalization_ but no support system...Medical professonal.Changing to wellbutrin.
Headache_ itching_ muscle aches_ nausea_ more depression_ anger_ constipation_ feet swelling_ general feeling of uneasiness
Comments: Made me feel terrible

Side Effects: Pressure headaches_ dizziness or disoriented_ mood swinds_ bursts of anger and unable to focus to complete tasks. Fell out of bed a few nights ago_ also had fallen previous that day. Very badly bruised foot and hip.

4 days now so not long enough to get an idea how it will help my depression.  Side effects: nausea (ugh!)_ dizziness_ hot flushing_ fatigue_ headache and lack of appetite.  Going to try to go a couple more weeks but the side effects are so unpleasant!

The first 4 days taking 5 mg of brintellix I experienced headaches_ sweating and pain in my esophagus   After 8 days I started on 10 mg and experienced a 5 lb weight gain and occasional pain in my esophagus .
Comments: Brintellix snapped me out of my depression immediately. I feel hopeful again. It's been 3 weeks now and life seems worth living again. I'm getting chores done that I have put off for months and I'm enjoying things in general. I plan on going up to 20mg as I am tolerating this drug well. I was on cymbalta for 7 years but it lost its efficacy. Brintellix helps my cognition whereas cymbalta made me feel numb.  I'm interested in reading how other people are doing on it. Not particularly pleased with the 5 lb weight gain so I'm going to get super strict with carbohydrates. Good luck to all and looking forward to reading your experience with Brintellix .

Side Effects: Nausea the first 2 weeks_ zero sex drive_ no weight gain_ but trouble losing weight despite intense exercise regimen and clean eating/calorie restriction
Comments: I was experiencing intense depression due to coming off of an addiction to prescription pain medicine. I had no energy_ was binge eating_ couldn't get off the couch_ extreme apathy for life and just couldn't experience any joy no matter what the occasion. Within 2 weeks of starting the Brintellix I was a completely different person.  I could live again. I started with 5 mg for 2 weeks and then went up to 10 mg. After 3 months I started feeling apathetic again and wanted to live on the couch. Upped it to 20 mg and also started an exercising daily and started a big weight loss program to lose the weight I gained in the winter. Despite everything I've done to lose weight_ I'm not losing any. My blood work came back normal and I've never had trouble losing weight so I'm assuming the Brintellix is to blame.  I also have absolutely NO sex drive and I feel sorry for my husband. I don't even want him to touch me. I've always had a high libido so this is definitely a negative. I never planned to stay on Brintellix long term and I feel like it was what I needed to get me out of my original depression. Now that I've started exercising daily_ eating healthy and taking supplements_ I feel like it's time to start weening off so that I can have my sex drive back and lose weight. I would definitely recommend this drug because it brought me out of a terrible depression. I've also noticed that irritability and PMS symptoms have greatly decreased as well as anxiety.

Side Effects: Grogginess_ difficulty getting out of bed_ a bit foggy throughout the day_ desire to take naps_ very slight nausea (however not much since I take it right before bed).  I'm not sure if I will be able to stand these side effects for the long term.  The sleepiness is too much!
Comments: I started taking Brintellix on May 4th when my doctor was helping me get off Venlafaxine (Generic form of Effexor).  I was tired of the venlafaxine.  I alternated doses of each for the first week_ and now I've been on Brintellix only full time since May 11th.  Very groggy still_ however my mood is stable for the most part.  It has helped me tremendously since the passing of my father on May 14th.  I've been able to cry and there is no emotional numbness. No deep despair.

Side Effects: dehydrated and constipation. That will pass by adjusting my diet a bit.
Comments: I feel normal now not manic not emotional. Little things that used to make me frustrated don't even bother me. Best thing is I am starting to lose some weight. I've been struggling with rapid weight gain last 8 months from lack of sleep and depression. All my blood work came back perfect no thyroid problems nothing that would cause weight gain. I can actually get out of bed now. I'm one mood all day where before I was manic to the point of exhaustion. I didn't know what was coming next from hour to hour it was really uncomfortable I felt out of control. It's only been a week at this point I'm just happy to feel relaxed and can concentrate.

Side Effects: NAUSEA! Itching the skin off my feet & constipation. I used to have panic attacks & haven't had one for nearly 15yrs since taking this med I've become so anxious & panicky I've had to start back on xanax. Feel extremely nervous_ feeling guilty & a bit paranoid at times. Can't cry but want to. Increased depression & feeling hopeless. Won't leave my house_ don't want to talk to anyone & unmotivated to do ANYTHING!BUT FEEL ANXIOUS AT THE SAME TIME! HORRIBLE uneasy feeling_ can not get happy! Was taking Cymbalta 60mg prior to this with Ability but weight gain made me switch to Brintellix_ REGRET! Calling my doc first thing in a.m. to change this! I'm miserable!
Comments: No help at all & now don't know what to do. Feeling scared but don't know why_ this med is not a good fit for me...Need something fast acting to switch to as I can't live like this_ its horrible.

Side Effects: Severe nausea_ vomiting_ aggressive anger_ headaches_ muscle stiffness
Comments: I have recently been diagnosed with Hashimoto's a thyroid auto immune disease and also have MDD. I have taken so many different antidepressants that's I'm terrified to switch to another but I also can't keep living like this on Brintellix. I don't know what to do anymore to make this better.

Side Effects: Nausea_ headaches_ anger
Comments: I wish this drug worked. I've tried so many my Dr. Doesn't know what to give me anymore. I feel numb which is somewhat good that I'm not crying but I'm also not happy. I feel angry and irritated over stupid stuff. Just feel hopeless.

Side Effects: Crippling nausea_ abdominal pain most of the day and night. Dizziness. Unable to sleep due to painful nausea.
Comments: Switched from Lexapro 10 mg hoping to help lose weight. No weight lost even with diet. Medical effectiveness no different than the Lexapro. Not worth the all day all night intense nausea.

Side Effects: Indescrible constant nausea_ intermittent bouts of violent vomiting. Insomnia.  Splitting headache.
Comments: Unable to function in my everyday world. Insomnia every night_ which is something I have never ever had. Vomiting so severe that I was afraid to get far away from the toilet. Headache so intense that no headache medication helped.  I am so disappointed_ but this medication is clearly contraindicated for me. Absolutely horrible experience.

Side Effects: So far I'm really liking it_ and I've had them all. I happened to see a leaflet on it in the doctor's waiting room_ luckily.
Comments: Hopeful.

Side Effects: after being on zoloft for several years_ I experienced some catastrophic events and needed a boost. My doctor recommended trying Brintellix. I eventually was up to the max dose of 20mg daily and began feeling unusually numb. I dropped down to 10mg and ever since then I have had terrible bouts between anxiety and full blown paranoia. I just saw my doctor today and made the switch back to zoloft. I will add that the brintellix did help with depression but I never felt like myself on it.
I didn't experience any side effects except for weight loss.  It decreased my appetite
Comments: I've been on every antidepressant out there.  The thing I like the best about it is that it doesn't give me any feeling of grogginess or balloon head.  Best one_ by far_ that I've ever been on.

Side Effects: Horrible nausea_ vomiting_ headache_ and panicking. Allergic reaction suspected.  Nausea still present weeks later.
Depression relieved_ yet having low libido.  Not sure if it's from the med or due to hormones.
Nausea for the first few weeks and a few dizzy spells
Comments: I am from Canada and take Trintellix_ I was recently hospitalized due to suicidal thoughts_ major depression and severe anxiety.  3 weeks into this medication I am laughing_ smiling_ SO much more energy and negative thinking has subsided completely. Have hope for the future now. This medicine saved my life. If your scared to try it_ please don't be. I'm medicine phobic but i probably wouldn't be here today if it was not for trintellix. Looking forward to more positive results as it takes 3 months to Take full effect. Also on 2mg Ativan daily.

Side Effects: Increased sex drive_ occasional nausea. Then I became pregnant....after 5 months of vomiting day and night_ I realized the brintellix mixed with my hormones made me terribly sick. The same day I cold turkey stopped the Brintellix_ I haven't vomited since
Comments: I am very sad and disappointed i had to stop the Brintellix because I have tried very single depression med out there and this was the only one that worked with minimal side effects and added bonus of increased sex drive. I plan on going back on it as soon as I have the baby. I didn't experience any of the itching or head aches others have referred to

Reason: Effexor stopped working for my depr
Side Effects: Nausea and vomiting...severe. Diarrhoea
Comments: I'd use it any time and definitely recommend it even with the severe nausea and vomiting. My mood has lifted and I have a cognitive brightness. I laugh more and am completely anxiety free

Side Effects: Loss of sex drive.  Gained weight.
Comments: It takes time for it to start working.  Within a few weeks I was feeling better.  Within a month I was feeling a lot better.  At 3 months I feel like a normal person again.  I don't cry all the time anymore and I sleep appropriately again.

Side Effects: Nausea the first day_ fatigue (but I have fms/cfs so..)_ moderate irrability in the afternoon before my dose is due_ headaches
Comments: I still cry. Just not as much. I'm still toying with the idea of suicide_ just not as much. I've been able to fake happy better. I'm not weeping uncontrollably for hours on end. There's some light tremors_ or shakiness in my hands. I've been kind of spaced out. Driving is not going smoothly_ I'm a danger out there_ no ability to judge distance & im easily distracted. But im tolerating it better than any other antidepressant ever tried. No hypomania_ no rocking involuntary back & forth or pacing or tapping my toes or rubbing my fingers together_ no intense desire to kill myself (that wasn't already there)_ no weight gain_ no lack of sex drive or inability to orgasam. So far_ it's ok. Am trirating up soon_ that's where all the real fun begins_ so I'll report back then

Side Effects: Moderate to severe nausea lasting 6-8 hours each day.
Comments: I was on Celexa for over 10 years but eventually it lost it's efficacy with me. I switched to Brintellix with no adverse effects during the transition. Within the first 2 weeks_ my husband first began to notice how much more I was laughing and smiling._ I have increased energy and feel better than I have in years.

Side Effects: Horrible nausea at first; usual SSRI sexual side-effects.  No weight gain.
Comments: Was switched to this after 10 yrs on Cymbalta (pooped out). Horrible nausea at first and still on occasion.  RX'ed Zofran to offset and it helps a lot.  Not a panacea (what is?)_ but I'm out of the "hole."  Not as tired as I ALWAYS was on Cymbalta_ which is great.  No weight gain.

Side Effects: Mild headache_ Extreme Sex Drive Increase_ Mild Nausea
Comments: Took this after taking viibryd for a year. It was such a relief to not have brain zaps anymore. I went from having no sex drive to wanting to hump everything in sight. Has helped me a lot.

Side Effects: vivid_ unpleasant dreams_ even weeks after use was discontinued
Comments: This drug gave me a little bit of energy during the day but was largely useless when it came to treating my depression.

Side Effects: Intense itching for first two weeks_ which subsided_ but returned after about 7 months. My face and scalp itched so intensely I literally scratched the blood out of my skin.  AND my hair began to fall out in large clumps.  Took about six weeks after stopping Brintellix for the itching and hair loss to stop. I would NEVER take this drug.  Benadryl did nothing for the itching.
Comments: Worked great for both depression and anxiety_ I felt so much better that I tried desperately to continue taking it in spite of the itching_ but could not bear for all my hair to fall out too! Side effects were worse than the MDD and anxiety.

Side Effects: The first day I took this medicine_ I felt just kind of a blah feeling_ but after that I have not had any major side effects except for a few bearable ones. I have had a sleepy _calm feeling. I think that this is what this medicine is suppose to do to help relax and wire me down. I am able to fall asleep without over thinking so much or even thinking random_ ongoing thoughts.I have had a little bit of itching in different places_but nothing that is unbearable. I have noticed yesterday that when I wanted to cry_it was hard to . I would get a little sad_ but I couldn't just bust in tears like usual_or even shed tears. I have also had small headaches here and there_but again_nothing unbearable. My mood I feel is a bit better. I'm a little brighter and more calm_ but I also feel that I haven't been on it long enough to feel the full affect. I was so scared to try this because of side affects _but I have been blessed to not feel anything horrible. I feel that this medicine will be a success in the long run.
Limited nausea at first. Started taking it before bed and don't have the symptoms any more.
Comments: Generally I am quite happy with product. I am a long term user of other anti-depressants and this one has fewer side effects.  I still am a bit down some of the time and wonder if a higher dose like 30 mg would do the trick. I enjoy not being constantly sleepy like I was with Lexapro et el.

Side Effects: None
Comments: No effect yet!

Side Effects: Extreme dizziness_ nausea_ muscle weakness_ back of neck stiff and tight_ pain behind eyes_ non stop diarrhea_ made acid reflux worse_ made anxiety worse
Comments: I am a veteran when it comes to psychiatric medications. Due to poor care over the years_ I've become med resistant which is scary and overwhelming. Please remember that everyone responds to these medications different. Also keep in mind when you are doing research that these medications take at least 30+ days to get in your system. I tried to battle out the side effects and today made the decision that the bad outweighs the good. The dizziness and muscle fatigue was terrible for me. The nausea was getting better and I found that taking it at night helped. I noticed that it killed my sex drive but oddly I had some of the best orgasams. Weird! I also felt like this med was trying to work but would fade followed by extreme anxiety. I also take depakote_ adderall_ ativan and saphris to sleep. After 2 months and still scary low_ I'm considering going off. My Dr bumped me up to 10 mg yesterday but I'm finding it hard to come up with the fight to continue a med that causes me so many side effects. Best of luck to everyone in search for their right combination.

Side Effects: Nausea_ headaches_ blurred vision_ trouble concentrating_ anxiety
Comments: At 5 mg the nausea was barely noticeable_ but within a few days of increasing to 10 mg it was very bad.  The headaches at 5 mg subsided after going up to 10 mg.  I've had very brief instances of feeling better_ but they fade quickly.  From what I was told by my pdoc this is a medicine that will either work for you_ work for a few weeks then stop_ or you'll never experience any benefit from it.  I had hoped that the SRI and 5-HT1A agonist effects would help my GAD/panic attacks_ but I've only experienced increased anxiety at 10 mg so far.

Side Effects: increased anxiety_ increased blood pressure was 110/70 with diovan immediately went up to 130/85_ then 140/90
Comments: no real benefit_ except less sleep_ back to normal 8.5 hours vsalmost 10 hours on lexapro and effexor

Side Effects: Itching_ headaches_ swelling in hands and feet.  Very tired all the time. Easily aggitated

No weight gain like with Lexapro_ however_ I don't have the calm_ level feeling I had with Lexapro.  I still have OCD "checking" of locks_ stove knobs_ kids breathing while asleep at night_ whereas with Lexapro it was minimal.  Due to $70 per month copay with our insurance I stopped cold turkey 4 days ago and haven't noticed any side effects.  When I got off Lexapro I weaned myself off VERY slowly but still felt like a walking explosion waiting to happen.  I have had NO itching like others commented.  Sleep normally at night.

after about three weeks began to feel better. Has made a great deal of difference improving my mood_ energy level and wanting to do things.added D3 after 2 months and that really helped too. finally some relief after years_ I mean at least 10 years of being depressed.
Nausea_ fatigue_ constipation_ no sex drive_ irritability_  itchiness.
Comments: I really had high hopes for this medication.  The first couple of days I experienced tiredness and nausea_ but I decided to stick it out for a while. Day three my anxiety was gone_ but the fatigue remained so I started to take it at night. Days went by and the symptoms just kept coming and getting worse. I ended up becoming irritable_ and uncomfortably itchy. My house is a mess. I have zero energy! No anxiety_  but all I want to do is sleep all day long.

Side Effects: Nausea_ stomach pain_ night sweats_ constipation. Side effects are not severe_ unpleasant but tolerable.
Intense itching all over my body but mostly in my scalp. Also developed rashes on my arms_ neck and face.
Comments: This drug really worked on improving my depression. Also_ it did not make me gain any weight like Lexapro.  But I can't tolerate the rash and itching.  So Unfortunately I have to get off of this medication.

Side Effects: I was having nausea at first but my doctor told me to take it after dinner/before bed and that cured it. He told me I would feel better after taking it for 2 weeks_ good after 4 weeks_ and WONDERFUL at 6 weeks. I wanted him to write that statement down because I was so depressed and doubtful anything could get me out of the pit. Well_ at 8 weeks I was a completely different person. I have energy_ I am not prone to the ups and downs_ I am finally getting my life back. I've tried many other anti-depressants (Zoloft_ Effexor_ Cymbalta_ and a few others over the past 15 years) and Brintellix quite simply saved my life. My only issue is with my PMS induced rage_ which this med doesn't seem to cure. My doctor just started me on 10mg of Prozac so we'll see if that helps. I also take Lamictal for BPD_ Adderrall_ Wellbutrin_ Phosphatidyl-Serine_ and n-acetylcysteine. Thank you_ Brintellix... Now if it wasn't so expensive_ even with insurance
Comments: I asked the company for assistance and was denied because I have insurance...sent the follow up letter and never heard back.

Side Effects: Ended up in ER for heart problem ....went home and a few days later woke up with my whole right side numb..right eye blurry.  Went to the ER again...Seem to have nerve damage on the right side. Working with a cardiac doctor and have to see a neurologist now.  I cannot drive or walk by myself when out in public due to the weakness_ and messed up motor skills. My memory is not right either.
Comments: DO NOT TAKE THIS MEDICATION.  RESEARCH BEFORE TRYING NEW DRUGS...WISH I DID NOW

Side Effects: I threw up for two weeks straight_ then I started taking it at lunch instead of breakfast and that helped stop the vomiting AND nausea.
Comments: Takes 30 days to feel effects...but I still have very few moments when I cry...other times I want to cry but can't

Side Effects: Didn't work

Itching all over my body.  I've had to itch my ears and head all the way down to the bottom of my legs.  My arms_ legs_ and stomach are the worst!  I have been itching non stop for 2 days now.  Benadryl won't even help with it!!  Someone at work asked me if something has changed because I was acting hyper.  Having a hard time falling asleep.

The first two weeks taking this medication I was on 10 mg's and I felt much better it seemed_ now that I am on 20 mgs my depression_ anxiety_ agoraphobia and feeling of over all depression has increased greatly_ very bad medication for me.

I cannot stop eating and it is tough to get out of bed.    Weight gain_ obviously. minor itching.    It has helped my anxiety and depression.   I am beginning to take half a pill and that has reduced the symptoms.

Has helped with overall daily depressive state_ but if I get upset_ it's like the world is ending - except that I wouldn't even care.  Anxiety/OCD seems to be worsening now that I'm at three months.  Have an irritable disposition anyway_ but now worse_ sometimes very bad. (also take lamictil for 3 years now).  Unsure what I'm going to do w/the med moving forward.
Worsening Anxiety
Comments: Brintellix helped me get out of bed_ but over time made my anxiety worse. Upped to 10mg after 3 mths. But dropped back to 5mg. Due to anxiety. Just went off of it a few days ago.

Side Effects: Itching_ sudden outburst of crying and a total feeling of tiredness. Lack of energy.
Did not help anxiety at all...actually made it worse...on day 10 had my first true panic attack ever...felt like I was dying...have not taken it since.
Comments: This medication did help very much with irritability I felt toward people and I was very disappointed that the anxiety worsening caused me to discontinue it.

Side Effects: some nausea_ now resolved.  no other side effects
Comments: Bipolar x 30 years_ resistant depression for over 2+ years_ was about to give up on everything_ had lost all faith in medications_ doc and I were considering ECT.  I haven't felt this good in over 2 years_ I was even able to stop the adderall I was taking for energy because I have plenty now. No more naps needed.  Life changer.  No weight gain either!

Side Effects: headache_ no motivation at all. hard to get out of bed and if i do i go straight to the couch and go back to sleep.
Comments: not having as many crying spells_ but i cant see myself living like this any further.

Side Effects: Nausea! I hate nausea..i would rather throw up

This is the ONLY anti-depressant that has NOT given me any intolerable side effects.  All the others (yes_ ALL) either cause severe headache_ constipation_ wild nightmares_ trouble peeing_ etc.  This one has no side effects for me_ other than maybe a little gas.
Comments: I titrated up to 20 mg from 10 (day 3)_ and I am doing fine!!  Hallelujah!!!  Miralcle.  Maybe now I can start to live.  Oh_ and Brintellix has totally regulated my sleep_ so I wake up at 7:29 each morning!!

Side Effects: Intense itching_ irritability_ confusion_ memory changes
Makes me sleepy when I take Ativan.  Otherwise no nausea_ no GI upsets_ no sexual side effects.
Comments: First antidepressant I have tried that seems to actually work.

Side Effects: My legs itched so bad I literally ripped the skin off itching so bad.  My legs bled and now scabbed over with severe bruising.  I would ONLY send this to Guantanamo Bay or anywhere else they torture prisoners.
Comments: I threw it in the garbage.  Another failed prescription.  I give up on the whole thing.  I'm pretty sure drug companies make these types of  drugs to make themselves billions.  Not because they care about the itchiness of our legs.

Side Effects: severe headaches_ nausea_ vomiting_ muscle aches_ low energy_ no sex drive_ weight gain_ depression is worse_ loss of memory_ blurred vision_ severe dry skin_ itching_ fever like symptoms_ just want to sleep
Comments: I would not recommend this to anyone. I am having more issues than I had before taking this. My depression / anxiety is worse and I am going to see another doctor to come off of it.

Side Effects: Severe itching. Raised little watery type blisters_ extremely itchy..Manic / hyper with higher dose
Comments: I literally have ripped my skin off of my legs the itching was so intense. They are clusters of little bumps that do not stop itching even with prescription medicine. They got worse as I was increased to 10 mg which in turn also made me manic/hyper.

Side Effects: increased heart rate_ sleep problems_ tension_ irritability
Comments: I was taking this drug for 8 weeks. 10 mg for 6 weeks and 20 mg for the last two weeks. The drug was ineffective and exacerbated some of the symptoms of my illness (exacerbated anxiety_ isolation from the people_ lack of motivation_ anhedonia). In addition_ I had nasty side effects - increased heart rate_ sleep problems_ tension_ irritability. As for me_ a waste of time and money.

Side Effects: practically non-stop flatulence; bloating_ nausea_ diarrhea to the point of rectal bleeding; swollen hands and feet; somnolence lasting until 3 pm each and every day in spite of sleeping 10-11 hours each night.

Sleepiness was the main side effect when I was taking only this drug and Wellbutrin. In combination with 5mg Prozac I am experiencing significant nausea and constipation. Never had these effects on even 40mg of Prozac long-term in the past.
Comments: I'm a fan of this drug. I've taken just about every SSRI_ and this gives me fewer side effects than any of them. I was avoiding SSRIs (like Prozac) due to them only working partially_ and basically feeling chemically castrated on them. I had a mind-blowing orgasm after 4 weeks on Brintellix_ which is encouraging. I'm feeling less depressed after 6 weeks. I'm able to keep my Wellbutrin dose lower on this--more Wellbutrin leaves me feeling angry and agitated.

Side Effects: I'm on day 5 & have developed severe itching & skin prickling. No significant improvement in depression. Having fatigue & also constipation.

Nausea for the first 2 weeks which has now subsided. Itching but not so bad that I've had to take benedryl. Extreme fatigue which has been the most annoying side effect. BUT i noticed a significant difference in my depression the first week I was on this since I'm pretty sensitive to meds. I will definitely keep taking this.

I am experiencing relief from depression but my skin is red from being itched! I have no rash (raised_ red bumps); however_ the discomfort has disrupted my life.  My skin is so itchy_ I have had to take Benedryl for 2 days in hopes that the inflammation will stop.

Anxiety and instability at times (and very possible it made my depression worse)_ irritability at times_ minor somnolence (moderate at doses of 5mg and up)_ spaciness (at higher doses)_ sweating/flushing_ increase in hunger at higher doses (but restricts appetite at lower doses)_ red/dry eyes_ mild headache for first couple hours after ingestion (at higher doses).
Comments: I'm med sensitive so I can only take lower dosages of most medications. I had high hopes for this being better than the SSRI/SNRI category_ but it's definitely a lot less effective for depression and I'm pretty certain it made my anxiety worse.

Side Effects: Constant itching of the skin.  Mostly on my breasts_ arms_ and right at the bottom of my stomach.  Some gas.
Comments: I have only been on it for a few days_ but the itching is constant

Side Effects: Minimal side effects_ really.  Some decreased sexual desire_ and decreased sexual pleasure.  I wasn't gaining weight at first_ but now it appears I've put on about 10 lbs since starting.  Not sure if this is due to the drug itself.  And_ also recently_ some itching in my arms that wasn't there before.
Comments: On the positive side_ Brintellix was more effective for my GAD and depression than Viibryd (similar mechanism of action).  I'd give Brintellix a 3.5/10 and Viibryd a 0.5/10.  Brintellix gives me a mild anti-anxiety_ antidepressant effect.  But it is not robust.  I still feel anxious_ paranoid_ and codependent.  I lack the ability to interact fully with others_ and to feel good about myself.  I still feel very disabled.  I am considering giving an MAOI a try (such as Nardil or Emsam) as I have pretty much lost faith in SSRI-type meds.

Side Effects: Itching (Went away)_ Nausea (Still present_ but easily countered with taking the medication on a full stomach)_ Weight Loss (Started when I took 20MG)
Comments: I originally started on 10MG and titrated my way up to 20MG. This is by far the best AD I've taken in my 5+ years of trying to find a medication. I've tried almost every AD on the market (SSRI's/SNRI's/TCA's/MAOI's/Antipsychotics). The pros definitely outweigh the cons for me. Also_ when I started taking 20MG of this medication I started loosing weight (20+ lbs so far). The only downside to this medication is that it's brand new and the co-pay is pretty high_ but I usually get samples at my psychiatrist's office and there is always the option of payment assistance from the pharmaceutical company.

Side Effects: Nausea for about 1 hour after taking it and heartburn/indigestion all day.  Nausea stopped after about 1 week.  The heartburn/indigestion continued.
Comments: I really wanted this to work well for me.  I have been through so many different medications that gave me terrible side effects.  After the first week_ the only side effect I had was heartburn/indigestion.  It was very tolerable.  Unfortunately_ it didn't help my anxiety and OCD at all.  I was actually worse after 6 weeks.  I did not try to increase the dose because I didn't want the heartburn to get worse.  Brintellix is not actually indicated for Anxiety and OCD but considering it is an SSRI I figured it would still work.

Side Effects: Nausea in first 2 weeks. Fatigue. Sleepiness during day but cannot take med after 8pm or it has the opposite effect.
Comments: I have been on viibryd and lamictal for years. Lamictal had quit even though it was good for anxiety left a small mg. I went on 10mg of brintellix and tapered off of viibryd. Started feeling very depressed when viibryd left. I called doc and he upped the brintellix to 20mg after 17 days. This is the 3rd day on 20mg. I am hoping this will help. This is the first day I have been social in a while. Still feel dull. Giving this med as much benefit as I can. I have read it takes 4 weeks to see an effect.

Side Effects: I have no experienced any side effects from this drug excepted delayed orgasm.
Comments: This drug was very easy to handle_ tirated easily_ and has been the most effective antidepressant of Zoloft_ Effexor_ and Wellbutrin. The unique pharmacology has changed my life.

Side Effects: Somewhat hyperactive_ after about the 6th day every night after taking one 10mg pill I started itching a lot to the point I had to take 50mg of Benadryl. Also I quit smoking 7 years ago but I am now getting intense cravings for cigarettes and started smoking 1 1/2 cigarettes each day for the past 3 days. Going to tell Psych I want off as I can't take the itching and I don't need to get addicted to cigarettes again.

Intially I had mild nausea for the first few days.  About day 7 I became more depressed and had more anxiety.  I tried to stick it out because the literature said some people felt better at 2 weeks. At 10 days I was feeling awful; heavy feeling and just being very down and tired.  I decided it was too much for me_ especially if I had to take it for 4-6 weeks before noticing an improvement. I calleld my Doc and got off this med.  I feel much better but still trying to find what works for me.
None
Comments: I had been taking Cymbalta 60mg for  5 years.  It worked great at first but over the past 6 months I was losing my concentration and motivation.  My doctor recommended switching to Brintellix.  He said it was one of the best drugs available.  I started at 10 mg and jumped to 2 0 after 2 weeks.  I tapered off Cymbalta during  this.  During my 5th week I was completely off cymbalta.  I started going into a tailspin with crying spells and massive anxiety.  I ended going back to Cymbalta and within 15 hours of taking it felt miraculously better. Sadly_  Brintellix did nothing for me.  No side effect_ no nothing.  I quit right away.  Very expensive.

Side Effects: I'm on this for anxiety but seem to be more anxious.  I also have the feeling of a lump in my throat and small light-weight pieces of food getting stuck to the inside of my throat.  I feel the need to swallow a LOT at night and that causes me more anxiety.  Neck muscles feel tight.
Comments: I started out on 10mg once a day a couple months ago.  Last week the doctor increased my dosage to 20mg once per day.  So far no change.

Side Effects: I think I am experiencing mild gas. But NO nausea which is great because that seems to be the most common side effect.
Comments: I feel very clear. I was taking Zoloft for about 7 months and was a zombie. I wasn't sad. I wasn't ANYTHING. I was still depressed ie; lacking motivation_ no joy in my life. I think I've found an anti-depressant that WORKS!
